description:
★ Balloon Animals in 3D ★
-Now a Universal App for iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch-
The EASIEST way to learn how to Twist Balloon Animals!

PRO version means:
There are NO Ads, and NO In-App Purchases in this PRO App!
All of the Balloon shapes we have ever made are included, and any new shapes we add in the future will be included in this PRO version at no additional charge.

Don't want to go PRO without trying the app out first? There is an Ad supported FREE version available with 3 shapes, just search "Balloon Animals free" on the App Store.
_____________________________________________

With this App, learn to make 11 different Balloon Animals and 5 Basic Balloon Twists. A Dollar Bill Origami Shirt is included as an added bonus!

The instructions are animated in 3D, so you can rotate and zoom the models.

Currently the app includes instructions for twisting a Dog, Sword, Bunny, Parrot, Giraffe, Cat, Teddy Bear, Monkey, Motorcycle, Flower and the newest shape, an Airplane.

We are currently working to add a horse, a scorpion and a poodle in near future. You can help support new shapes by telling your friends about the app and leaving a rating/review on the App Store!

Read the App REVIEWS!
_____________________________________________

★★★★★ - "The easiest instructions ever!"  

                      - Edwards6882

★★★★ - "As a professional balloon artist, I would recommend this app to any beginner!…"  

                       - Katherine M

★★★★★ - "I've never known how to fold dollars and twist balloons but now I do I think this app is amazing I think this app may have just given me a new hobby!! :):):):)"  

                       - Sarahdoodles8
_____________________________________________

Balloons are MAJORLY CHEAP at most grocery stores and pharmacies, so no excuses and no sniveling!

When you are ready to move on to the high quality balloons, go to www.learn2make.com/store or follow the Purchase link from within the App.

★ When you buy your balloons from our store or the In App Link, you support our ability to bring you future app updates and new shape instructions!  ★

FEATURES:

- 5 animated basic twist instructions - Just follow the animated hands!

- Text Instructions and Hints.

- Fully interactive 3D models.  It's like playing a video game to learn Balloon Twisting!

3D CONTROLS- Explained with pictures in the App
_____________________________________________

Rotate - Drag/Swipe one finger across the screen
Zoom In - Spread two fingers on screen
Zoom Out - Pinch two fingers together on screen
_____________________________________________

- Instructions going to fast?  Slow them down with the touch of a button.

- Don't want the instructions to leave you behind? Steps repeat until YOU are ready to move on.

- Text hints and instructions for extra help with each shape.

- Additional Shape Instructions will be made available on a regular basis!

Remember with this PRO version, there are no Ads, and you will never need to buy another Shape Instruction because all future instructions will be included without any additional charges! If you would prefer to download the app for free and only pay for the shapes you want, get our other app "Balloon Animals." just search for it on the App Store.
releaseNotes:
Now a Universal App- Try it out on your iPad!
Fixed crashes which happened on older devices.
Added a New Shape Instruction - Learn to make a Balloon AIRPLANE!
Updated instructions screen.
